channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Easergy P5
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Easergy P5

item.title: CVE-2022-34756|2024-09-17T04:09:06.583Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20p5
item.description: A CWE-120: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input vulnerability exists that could result in remote code execution or the crash of HTTPs stack which is used for the device Web HMI. Affected Products: Easergy P5 (V01.401.102 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2022-34758|2024-09-17T00:50:40.234Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20p5
item.description: A CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists that could cause the device watchdog function to be disabled if the attacker had access to privileged user credentials. Affected Products: Easergy P5 (V01.401.102 and prior)
